) } const BodySecond = () => { const secondVideoRef = useRef(null); const [icon, setIcon] = useState("play"); const playSecondVideo = () => { setIcon(icon === "play" ? "pause" : "play") icon === "play" ? secondVideoRef.current.play() : secondVideoRef.current.pause(); } return (

Welcome to Rehoboth

We are an Ethiopian Evangelical Church located in Tulsa, Oklahoma. Join us for in an in-person, or online service. We are Live every Sunday between 11 am and 1 pm Central time.
